exceptions.tactic: intros k p q u l g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p q u l g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p' q u l g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p' q' u l g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p' q' u' l g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p' q' u' l' g H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros k' p' q' u' l' g' H1 H2 H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: In environment k, p, q, g, l, u : nat H : k * p <= q H0 : p = u * g H1 : is_gcd p q g H2 : is_lcm p q l H3 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> p div l - u * p Unable to unify "exists p : nat, ?M1526 - ?M1527 * ?M1523 = p * ?M1523" with "p div l - k * u * p /\\ q - k * p div l - k * u * p /\\ (forall k0 : nat, p div k0 -> q - k * p div k0 -> l - k * u * p div k0)".

In environment k, p, q, g, l, u : nat H : k * p <= q H0 : p = u * g H1 : is_gcd p q g H2 : is_lcm p q l Unable to unify "?M1454 * ?M1456 <= ?M1455 * ?M1457" with "p div l - k * u * p /\\ q - k * p div l - k * u * p /\\ (forall k0 : nat, p div k0 -> q - k * p div k0 -> l - k * u * p div k0)".
In environment k, p, q, g, l, u : nat H : k * p <= q H0 : p = u * g H1 : is_gcd p q g H2 : is_lcm p q l H3 : g div p H4 : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "is_lcm p (q - k * p) (l - k * u * p)".

original: intros k p q u l g H1 H2 H3 H4. apply is_lcm_minus. - apply mult_le_compat. apply H1. auto. - auto. - apply H3. - apply H4.
